# Introduction

This vignette provides a quick usage guide to the `clustRviz` package, 
including fitting and visualization.
In the sections below we work through two example datasets, 
illustrating both clustering and biclustering.
While many details and customizations are discussed in [Details Vignette](clustRvizDetails.html), 
for now we show how `clustRviz` can quickly and easily be used to achieved 
insights into our clustering solutions.
